summary: DRIVER SIDE TORSION BAR BROKE DRIVING 60 ON FREEWAY. MADE TRUCK VEER HARD TO LEFT ALMOST HITTING GUARD RAIL.  THANK GOD MY SON DIDN'T HIT IT.  BROUGHT THE TRUCK USED AND OF COURSE DEALER SAID IT WASN'T UNDER WARRANTY THAT WE HAD.  ONLY THE 60 DAYS OR 2500 MILES FROM TIME OF PURCHASED.  ONLY HAD IN 25 DAYS.   *NLM
